pisces.d

Class Paint

  • java.lang.Object
    • pisces.d.FPMath
      • pisces.d.FXMath
        • pisces.d.Paint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants

    public abstract class Paint
extends FXMath
    Rendering plugin works on fixed point (S15.16) coordinate values.
    See Also:
